fieldUpdates.formula: upper( $User.FirstName ) & " " & upper( $User.LastName )& " (" & text(month(today())) & "/"& text(day(today())) & "/"& text(year(today()))& " " & Left((right((text(Now())),9)),8) & ")" & BR() & "- " & Comments__c & BR() & BR() & Comment_Log__c

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISNULL( Questionnaire_Review__c ) , CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE( Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c ) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 1, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 2, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 3, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 4, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+4, 5, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+4, 6, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+3, NULL), CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE( Questionnaire_Review__c ) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 1, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 2, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 3, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 4, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+4, 5, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+4, 6, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+3, NULL))
fieldUpdates.name: TAA: Maintain - Build Due Date

fieldUpdates.description: Used by Time and attendance to update the build date to correspond with the Training date
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISNULL( Questionnaire_Review__c ) , CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE( Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c ) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 1, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 2, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 3, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+2, 4, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+4, 5, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+4, 6, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c)+3, NULL), CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE( Questionnaire_Review__c ) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 1, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 2, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 3, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+2, 4, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+4, 5, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+4, 6, DATEVALUE(Questionnaire_Review__c)+3, NULL))

fieldUpdates.description: Used by the Time and Attendance department to note the date the Clocks should be installed at a client site after the Questionnaire is reviewed.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(Case_Lookup__r.Clocks_Ordered__c ,"No",NULL, CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW() + 23, 1, NOW() + 22, 2, NOW() + 22, 3, NOW() + 22, 4, NOW() + 22, 5, NOW() + 24, 6, NOW() + 24, NULL))
fieldUpdates.name: TAA: Set Clock Install Date

fieldUpdates.description: Update meet & Greet date to be 4 business days greater than case creation date.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 3, 1, TODAY() + 3, 2, TODAY() + 3, 3, TODAY() + 5, 4, TODAY() + 5, 5, TODAY() + 5, 6, TODAY() + 4, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: TAA: Set M&G Date

fieldUpdates.description: When a Time and Attendance Onboarding case is created, this will populate the Questionnaitre review date with the last date this can be scheduled for.
fieldUpdates.name: TAA: Set Questionnaire Date

fieldUpdates.description: Used by the Time and Attendance department to populate the date the suite build will need to be complete
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 23, 1, TODAY() + 22, 2, TODAY() + 22, 3, TODAY() + 22, 4, TODAY() + 22, 5, TODAY() + 24, 6, TODAY() + 24, NULL)

rules.fullName: TAA%3A eService Email Send TLO Only
rules.description: Workflow rule to send and email to eServices when the TLO Implementation Coordinator field is populated and the account Online Services Integration field includes TLO, but not HRO.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( TLO_Implementation_Coordinator__c ) && NOT( eServices_Email_Sent__c ) && INCLUDES( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c , 'TLO') && NOT(INCLUDES(Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c , 'HRO')) && ( eServices_Email__c="eservices_408@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_435@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_416@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_451@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_477@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_411@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_439@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_444@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_453@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_479@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_412@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_440@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_445@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_470@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_480@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_414@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_441@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_447@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_472@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_482@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_415@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_407@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_450@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_475@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_483@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="jstouffer@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="dcorujo@paychex.com" )

rules.description: Workflow rule to send and email to eServices when the TLO Implementation Coordinator field is populated and the account Online Services Integration field includes TLO and HRO.
rules.formula:
ISCHANGED( TLO_Implementation_Coordinator__c ) && NOT( eServices_Email_Sent__c ) && INCLUDES( Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c , 'TLO') && INCLUDES(Case_Lookup__r.Account.Online_Services_Integration__c , 'HRO') && ( eServices_Email__c="eservices_408@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_435@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_416@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_451@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_477@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_411@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_439@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_444@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_453@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_479@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_412@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_440@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_445@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_470@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_480@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_414@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_441@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_447@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_472@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_482@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_415@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_407@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_450@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_475@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="eservices_483@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="jstouffer@paychex.com"|| eServices_Email__c="dcorujo@paychex.com"
)
